content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang. As you already know, I am Peter Schmidt, and I am renting out my newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg. Let's focus on the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 400 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is too low for me, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand. I will offer 450 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is still too low for me, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I offer 480 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is a better offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a good offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a reasonable offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
